inclusion.criterion: Documented atherosclerotic stenosis in carotid artery
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Statin treatment is indicated, following ANSM guidelines (French drug agency)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient or a legal representative signs consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient is affiliated to social security system
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Ischemic stroke/TIA due to arterial dissection (investigator judgment)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Cardiac source of embolism (e.g., mitral stenosis, endomyocardial fibrosis) without documented atherosclerotic stenosis
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has history of CAD s/p CABG and PVD with carotid bruits. He reports occasional dizziness but no prior syncope or sensory/motor defects.
